docs.text: Sudhakar's Notebook Welcome to my Personal Blog . Feel free to browse around. Business Kit This is the most ambitious project I'm working on currently. I believe the future is moving towards Creators, Entrepreneurs, Freelancers and Consultants than the standard 9 to 5 Jobs. I want to support them to upto speed in business topics. I am reading big bulky books and condense them into digestable concepts. Other Essays The Essays that doesn't fit to above criteria are filled here. When some topic is getting repeated frequently, It will get its own category. Book Summaries To do Business Kit project well, I've to read lots of books. When I get something significant out of the book, I'll try to write them. It is mostly my reflections and take aways from them book. Subscription Form: You can subscribe to my blog using the link . Note : If this blog looks odd, It's because I'm taking a hands-on approach. I'm writing in markdown with the help of Mkdocs with Material Theme and hosting at GitHub .

docs.text: Shitty First Draft Steve Smith is Australian cricketer who started his career as Bowler, then named as all-rounder and finally became one of the best batsman in the world. If you take Ravindra Jadeja also has similar career change. But the current generation starting from 90s, people are making their career choices when they are 15, at least here in India. After that, they are given less chances to divert from the path.
docs.title: **Shitty First Draft**

After that, they are given less chances to divert from the path.
